trans-unit.source: Exposes SQL Server data that is stored with the FILESTREAM column attribute as a sequence of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 公開使用 FILESTREAM 資料行屬性儲存為位元組序列的 SQL Server 資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlFileStream> class is used to work with `varbinary(max)` data stored with the FILESTREAM attribute in a SQL Server 2008 database.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlFileStream>類別用來搭配`varbinary(max)`具有 FILESTREAM 屬性，在 SQL Server 2008 資料庫中儲存的資料。

trans-unit.source: You must install the .NET Framework 3.5 SP1 (or later) to use <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlFileStream> to work with FILESTREAM data.
trans-unit.target: 您必須安裝.NET Framework 3.5 SP1 （或更新版本） 使用<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlFileStream>來處理 FILESTREAM 資料。

trans-unit.source: Specifying the FILESTREAM attribute on a `varbinary(max)` column causes SQL Server to store the data in the local NTFS file system instead of in the database file.
trans-unit.target: 指定 FILESTREAM 屬性`varbinary(max)`資料行使得 SQL Server 將資料儲存在本機 NTFS 檔案系統而不是資料庫檔案中。

trans-unit.source: Transact-SQL statements provide data manipulation capabilities within the server, and Win32 file system interfaces provide streaming access to the data.
trans-unit.target: TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式提供在伺服器、 資料操作功能和 Win32 檔案系統介面提供了資料流資料的存取權。

trans-unit.source: Individual files stored in a FILESTREAM column cannot be opened directly from the NTFS file system.
trans-unit.target: 無法直接從 NTFS 檔案系統開啟儲存在 FILESTREAM 資料行中的個別檔案。

trans-unit.source: Streaming FILESTREAM data works only in the context of a SQL Server transaction.
trans-unit.target: 資料流處理 FILESTREAM 資料僅適用於 SQL Server 交易的內容。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlFileStream> class is derived from the <xref:System.IO.Stream> class, which represents an abstraction of a sequence of bytes from some arbitrary data source such as a file or a block of memory.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlFileStream>類別衍生自<xref:System.IO.Stream>類別，表示某個任意資料來源，例如檔案或記憶體區塊的位元組序列的抽象概念。

trans-unit.source: You can read from a FILESTREAM by transferring data from a stream into a data structure such as an array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將資料從資料流傳輸至資料結構，例如位元組陣列來讀取 FILESTREAM。

trans-unit.source: You can write to a FILESTREAM by transferring the data from a data structure into a stream.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將資料從資料結構傳送到資料流寫入 FILESTREAM。

trans-unit.source: You can also seek within the stream, which allows you to query and modify data at the current position within the stream.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以在資料流可讓您查詢及修改資料在資料流中目前的位置中搜尋。

trans-unit.source: For conceptual documentation and code examples, see [FILESTREAM Data](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/filestream-data.md).
trans-unit.target: 概念文件及程式碼範例，請參閱[FILESTREAM 資料](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/filestream-data.md)。

trans-unit.source: For documentation about setting up and configuring FILESTREAM data on SQL Server, see [Designing and Implementing FILESTREAM Storage](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=121499) in SQL Server 2008 Books Online.
trans-unit.target: 如需安裝及設定 SQL Server 上的 FILESTREAM 資料的文件，請參閱[來設計和實作 FILESTREAM 儲存體](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=121499)SQL Server 2008 線上叢書 》 中。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlFileStream" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlFileStream" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the code access security (CAS) permissions that all callers in the stack must have to use the `SqlFileStream` constructors.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出在堆疊中的所有呼叫端必須擁有要使用的程式碼存取安全性 (CAS) 權限`SqlFileStream`建構函式。

trans-unit.source: File access
trans-unit.target: 檔案存取

trans-unit.source: Permission
trans-unit.target: 權限

trans-unit.source: Read
trans-unit.target: 讀取

trans-unit.source: Write
trans-unit.target: Write

trans-unit.source: ReadWrite
trans-unit.target: ReadWrite

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read> and <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read> 和 <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write>

trans-unit.source: For more information about CAS, see [Code Access Security and ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/code-access-security.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需 CA 的詳細資訊，請參閱[程式碼存取安全性和 ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/code-access-security.md)。

trans-unit.source: The logical path to the file.
trans-unit.target: 檔案的邏輯路徑。

trans-unit.source: The path can be retrieved by using the Transact-SQL Pathname function on the underlying FILESTREAM column in the table.
trans-unit.target: 可在資料表的基礎 FILESTREAM 資料行上使用 Transact-SQL Pathname 函式來擷取路徑。

trans-unit.source: The transaction context for the <see langword="SqlFileStream" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="SqlFileStream" /> 物件的交易內容。

trans-unit.source: Applications should return the byte array returned by calling the GET_FILESTREAM_TRANSACTION_CONTEXT method.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式應該會傳回透過呼叫 GET_FILESTREAM_TRANSACTION_CONTEXT 方法所傳回的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: The access mode to use when opening the file.
trans-unit.target: 開啟檔案時要使用的存取模式。

trans-unit.source: Supported <see cref="T:System.IO.FileAccess" /> enumeration values are <see cref="F:System.IO.FileAccess.Read" />, <see cref="F:System.IO.FileAccess.Write" />, and <see cref="F:System.IO.FileAccess.ReadWrite" />.
trans-unit.target: 支援的 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileAccess" /> 列舉值是 <see cref="F:System.IO.FileAccess.Read" />、<see cref="F:System.IO.FileAccess.Write" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.IO.FileAccess.ReadWrite" />。

trans-unit.source: When using <see langword="FileAccess.Read" />, the <see langword="SqlFileStream" /> object can be used to read all of the existing data.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see langword="FileAccess.Read" /> 時，<see langword="SqlFileStream" /> 物件可以用來讀取所有現有資料。

trans-unit.source: When using <see langword="FileAccess.Write" />, <see langword="SqlFileStream" /> points to a zero byte file.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see langword="FileAccess.Write" /> 時，<see langword="SqlFileStream" /> 指向零位元組檔案。

trans-unit.source: Existing data will be overwritten when the object is closed and the transaction is committed.
trans-unit.target: 物件關閉及認可交易時會覆寫現有資料。

trans-unit.source: When using <see langword="FileAccess.ReadWrite" />, the <see langword="SqlFileStream" /> points to a file which has all the existing data in it.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see langword="FileAccess.ReadWrite" /> 時，<see langword="SqlFileStream" /> 指向其中具有所有現有資料的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The handle is positioned at the beginning of the file.
trans-unit.target: 控制代碼位於檔案的開頭。

trans-unit.source: You can use one of the <see langword="System.IO" /><see langword="Seek" /> methods to move the handle position within the file to write or append new data.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用其中一個 <see langword="System.IO" /><see langword="Seek" /> 方法，在檔案內移動控制代碼的位置，以便寫入或附加新資料。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlFileStream" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlFileStream" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown, any open transactions should be rolled back.
trans-unit.target: 如果擲回例外狀況，應該會復原任何開啟的交易。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, data loss can occur.
trans-unit.target: 否則，可能發生資料遺失。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is a null reference, or <paramref name="transactionContext" /> is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 為 null 參考，或 <paramref name="transactionContext" /> 為 null。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is an empty string (""), contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 為空字串 ("")，只包含空格或包含一或多個無效字元。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> begins with "\\\\.\\", for example "\\\\.\PHYSICALDRIVE0 ".
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 開頭為 "\\\\.\\"，例如 "\\\\.\PHYSICALDRIVE0 "。

trans-unit.source: The handle returned by the call to NTCreateFile is not of type FILE_TYPE_DISK.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫至 NTCreateFile 所傳回的控制代碼不是 FILE_TYPE_DISK 類型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="options" /> contains an unsupported value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="options" /> 包含不支援的值。

trans-unit.source: The file cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到檔案。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 發生 I/O 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: The specified <paramref name="path" /> is invalid, such as being on an unmapped drive.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <paramref name="path" /> 無效，例如位於未對應的磁碟機上。

trans-unit.source: The access requested is not permitted by the operating system for the specified path.
trans-unit.target: 指定路徑的作業系統不允許要求的存取。

trans-unit.source: This occurs when Write or ReadWrite access is specified, and the file or directory is set for read-only access.
trans-unit.target: 當 Write 或 ReadWrite 存取已指定，且檔案或目錄設為唯讀存取時，就會發生這種狀況。

trans-unit.source: NtCreateFile fails with error code set to ERROR_SHARING_VIOLATION.
trans-unit.target: NtCreateFile 會失敗並傳回設為 ERROR_SHARING_VIOLATION 的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: The logical path to the file.
trans-unit.target: 檔案的邏輯路徑。

trans-unit.source: The path can be retrieved by using the Transact-SQL Pathname function on the underlying FILESTREAM column in the table.
trans-unit.target: 可在資料表的基礎 FILESTREAM 資料行上使用 Transact-SQL Pathname 函式來擷取路徑。

trans-unit.source: The transaction context for the <see langword="SqlFileStream" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="SqlFileStream" /> 物件的交易內容。

trans-unit.source: When set to null, an implicit transaction will be used for the <see langword="SqlFileStream" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 當設定為 null 時，隱含的交易會用於 <see langword="SqlFileStream" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Applications should return the byte array returned by calling the GET_FILESTREAM_TRANSACTION_CONTEXT method.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式應該會傳回透過呼叫 GET_FILESTREAM_TRANSACTION_CONTEXT 方法所傳回的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: The access mode to use when opening the file.
trans-unit.target: 開啟檔案時要使用的存取模式。

trans-unit.source: Supported <see cref="T:System.IO.FileAccess" /> enumeration values are <see cref="F:System.IO.FileAccess.Read" />, <see cref="F:System.IO.FileAccess.Write" />, and <see cref="F:System.IO.FileAccess.ReadWrite" />.
trans-unit.target: 支援的 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileAccess" /> 列舉值是 <see cref="F:System.IO.FileAccess.Read" />、<see cref="F:System.IO.FileAccess.Write" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.IO.FileAccess.ReadWrite" />。

trans-unit.source: When using <see langword="FileAccess.Read" />, the <see langword="SqlFileStream" /> object can be used to read all of the existing data.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see langword="FileAccess.Read" /> 時，<see langword="SqlFileStream" /> 物件可以用來讀取所有現有資料。

trans-unit.source: When using <see langword="FileAccess.Write" />, <see langword="SqlFileStream" /> points to a zero byte file.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see langword="FileAccess.Write" /> 時，<see langword="SqlFileStream" /> 指向零位元組檔案。

trans-unit.source: Existing data will be overwritten when the object is closed and the transaction is committed.
trans-unit.target: 物件關閉及認可交易時會覆寫現有資料。

trans-unit.source: When using <see langword="FileAccess.ReadWrite" />, the <see langword="SqlFileStream" /> points to a file which has all the existing data in it.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see langword="FileAccess.ReadWrite" /> 時，<see langword="SqlFileStream" /> 指向其中具有所有現有資料的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The handle is positioned at the beginning of the file.
trans-unit.target: 控制代碼位於檔案的開頭。

trans-unit.source: You can use one of the <see langword="System.IO" /><see langword="Seek" /> methods to move the handle position within the file to write or append new data.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用其中一個 <see langword="System.IO" /><see langword="Seek" /> 方法，在檔案內移動控制代碼的位置，以便寫入或附加新資料。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the option to use while opening the file.
trans-unit.target: 指定開啟檔案時要使用的選項。

trans-unit.source: Supported <see cref="T:System.IO.FileOptions" /> values are <see cref="F:System.IO.FileOptions.Asynchronous" />, <see cref="F:System.IO.FileOptions.WriteThrough" />, <see cref="F:System.IO.FileOptions.SequentialScan" />, and <see cref="F:System.IO.FileOptions.RandomAccess" />.
trans-unit.target: 支援的 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileOptions" /> 值為 <see cref="F:System.IO.FileOptions.Asynchronous" />、<see cref="F:System.IO.FileOptions.WriteThrough" />、<see cref="F:System.IO.FileOptions.SequentialScan" />和 <see cref="F:System.IO.FileOptions.RandomAccess" />。

trans-unit.source: The allocation size to use while creating a file.
trans-unit.target: 建立檔案時要用的配置大小。

trans-unit.source: If set to 0, the default value is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果設為 0，即使用預設值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlFileStream" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlFileStream" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown, any open transactions should be rolled back.
trans-unit.target: 如果擲回例外狀況，應該會復原任何開啟的交易。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, data loss can occur.
trans-unit.target: 否則，可能發生資料遺失。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is a null reference, or <paramref name="transactionContext" /> is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 為 null 參考，或 <paramref name="transactionContext" /> 為 null。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is an empty string (""), contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 為空字串 ("")，只包含空格或包含一或多個無效字元。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> begins with "\\\\.\\", for example "\\\\.\PHYSICALDRIVE0 ".
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 開頭為 "\\\\.\\"，例如 "\\\\.\PHYSICALDRIVE0 "。

trans-unit.source: The handle returned by call to NTCreateFile is not of type FILE_TYPE_DISK.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 NTCreateFile 所傳回的控制代碼不是 FILE_TYPE_DISK 類型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="options" /> contains an unsupported value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="options" /> 包含不支援的值。

trans-unit.source: The file cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到檔案。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 發生 I/O 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: The specified <paramref name="path" /> is invalid, such as being on an unmapped drive.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <paramref name="path" /> 無效，例如位於未對應的磁碟機上。

trans-unit.source: The access requested is not permitted by the operating system for the specified path.
trans-unit.target: 指定路徑的作業系統不允許要求的存取。

trans-unit.source: This occurs when Write or ReadWrite access is specified, and the file or directory is set for read-only access.
trans-unit.target: 當 Write 或 ReadWrite 存取已指定，且檔案或目錄設為唯讀存取時，就會發生這種狀況。

trans-unit.source: NtCreateFile fails with error code set to ERROR_SHARING_VIOLATION.
trans-unit.target: NtCreateFile 會失敗並傳回設為 ERROR_SHARING_VIOLATION 的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: The buffer to read the data into.
trans-unit.target: 讀取資料的緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: The byte offset in <c>buffer</c> at which to begin writing data read from the stream.
trans-unit.target: 開始寫入自資料流讀取資料的「緩衝區」<c></c> 位元組位移。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to read.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取的最大位元組數。

trans-unit.source: An optional asynchronous callback, to be called when the read is complete.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性的非同步回呼，在讀取完成時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous read request from other requests
trans-unit.target: 使用者所提供的物件，其可以從其他要求中區分出這個特定非同步讀取的要求。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous read operation.
trans-unit.target: 開始非同步的讀取作業。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that represents the asynchronous read, which could still be pending.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />，代表可能還在擱置中的非同步讀取。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlFileStream.CanRead%2A> property to determine whether the current instance supports reading.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlFileStream.CanRead%2A>屬性來判斷目前的執行個體是否支援讀取。

trans-unit.source: Reading data is not supported on the stream.
trans-unit.target: 此資料流不支援讀取資料。

trans-unit.source: The buffer to write data from.
trans-unit.target: 寫入資料的來源緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: The byte offset in <c>buffer</c> from which to begin writing.
trans-unit.target: <c>buffer</c> 中要從該處開始寫入的位元組位移。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to write.
trans-unit.target: 寫入的最大位元組數。

trans-unit.source: An optional asynchronous callback, to be called when the write is complete.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性的非同步回呼，在寫入完成時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous write request from other requests.
trans-unit.target: 使用者所提供的物件，其可以從其他要求中區分出這個特定非同步寫入的要求。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous write operation.
trans-unit.target: 開始非同步的寫入作業。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that represents the asynchronous write, which could still be pending.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />，代表可能還在擱置中的非同步寫入。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlFileStream.CanWrite%2A> property to determine whether the current instance supports writing.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlFileStream.CanWrite%2A>屬性來判斷目前的執行個體是否支援寫入。

trans-unit.source: Writing data is not supported on the stream.
trans-unit.target: 此資料流不支援寫入資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current stream supports reading.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示目前資料流是否支援讀取的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current stream supports reading; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前資料流支援讀取，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current stream supports seeking.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示目前資料流是否支援搜尋的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current stream supports seeking; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前資料流支援搜尋，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current stream can time out.
trans-unit.target: 取得指出目前資料流是否會逾時的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current stream can time out; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的資料流會逾時，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current stream supports writing.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示目前資料流是否支援寫入的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current stream supports writing; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前資料流支援寫入，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The reference to the pending asynchronous request to finish.
trans-unit.target: 要完成的擱置中非同步要求的參考。

trans-unit.source: Waits for the pending asynchronous read to complete.
trans-unit.target: 等候暫止的非同步讀取完成。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes read from the stream, between zero (0) and the number of bytes you requested.
trans-unit.target: 從資料流讀取的位元組數，位於零 (0) 和您所要求的位元組數之間。

trans-unit.source: Streams return zero (0) only at the end of the stream, otherwise, they should block until at least one byte is available.
trans-unit.target: 資料流只在資料流結尾傳回零 (0)，否則，它們應該封鎖，直到至少有一個位元組可用為止。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object did not come from the corresponding <see langword="BeginRead" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 物件不是來自對應的 <see langword="BeginRead" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the outstanding asynchronous I/O request.
trans-unit.target: 未處理的非同步 I/O 要求的參考。

trans-unit.source: Ends an asynchronous write operation.
trans-unit.target: 結束非同步的寫入作業。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object did not come from the corresponding <see langword="BeginWrite" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 物件不是來自對應的 <see langword="BeginWrite" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that resources are freed and other cleanup operations are performed when the garbage collector reclaims the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlFileStream" />.
trans-unit.target: 確認釋出資源，並在記憶體回收行程再利用 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlFileStream" /> 時執行其他清除作業。

trans-unit.source: clears all buffers for this stream and causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying device.
trans-unit.target: 清除這個資料流的所有緩衝區，並造成所有緩衝資料都寫入基礎裝置。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the length of the current stream in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 取得指出目前資料流長度的值 (位元組)。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> indicating the length of the current stream in bytes.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int64" />，表示目前資料流的長度 (以位元組為單位)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the logical path of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlFileStream" /> passed to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 取得傳遞至建構函式之 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlFileStream" /> 的邏輯路徑。

trans-unit.source: A string value indicating the name of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlFileStream" />.
trans-unit.target: 字串值，表示 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlFileStream" /> 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position within the current stream.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在目前資料流中的位置。

trans-unit.source: The current position within the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlFileStream" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlFileStream" /> 內目前的位置。

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, the buffer contains the specified byte array with the values between offset and (offset + count - 1) replaced by the bytes read from the current source.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法返回時，緩衝區會包含其值介於位移和 (位移 + 計數 - 1) 之間，並由讀取自目前來源的位元組取代的指定位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based byte offset in buffer at which to begin storing the data read from the current stream.
trans-unit.target: 緩衝區中以零為起始的位元組位移，即開始儲存讀取自目前資料流之資料的位置。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to be read from the current stream.
trans-unit.target: 自目前資料流讀取的最大位元組數。

trans-unit.source: Reads a sequence of bytes from the current stream and advances the position within the stream by the number of bytes read.
trans-unit.target: 從目前的資料流讀取位元組序列，並依讀取的位元組數將資料流中的位置往前移。

trans-unit.source: The total number of bytes read into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 緩衝區所讀取的總位元組數。

trans-unit.source: This can be less than the number of bytes requested if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero (0) if the end of the stream has been reached.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前無法取得足夠的位元組，則這個數目可能小於所要求的位元組數，如果已經到達資料流末端，則為零 (0)。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlFileStream.CanRead%2A> property to determine whether the current instance supports writing.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlFileStream.CanRead%2A>屬性來判斷目前的執行個體是否支援寫入。

trans-unit.source: The object does not support reading of data.
trans-unit.target: 此物件不支援讀取資料。

trans-unit.source: Reads a byte from the stream and advances the position within the stream by one byte, or returns -1 if at the end of the stream.
trans-unit.target: 從資料流讀取一個位元組，並將資料流的位置推進一個位元組；如果在資料流末端，則傳回 -1。

trans-unit.source: The unsigned byte cast to an <see cref="T:System.Int32" />, or -1 if at the end of the stream.
trans-unit.target: 轉型為 <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 的不帶正負號位元組，如果在資料流末端，則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlFileStream.CanRead%2A> property to determine whether the current instance supports reading.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlFileStream.CanRead%2A>屬性來判斷目前的執行個體是否支援讀取。

trans-unit.source: The object does not support reading of data.
trans-unit.target: 此物件不支援讀取資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value, in milliseconds, that determines how long the stream will attempt to read before timing out.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值 (以毫秒為單位)，該值決定資料流在逾時前將嘗試讀取多長時間。

trans-unit.source: A value, in milliseconds, that determines how long the stream will attempt to read before timing out.
trans-unit.target: 可決定資料流在逾時前將嘗試讀取多長時間的值 (以毫秒為單位)。

trans-unit.source: A byte offset relative to the <c>origin</c> parameter
trans-unit.target: 相對於 <c>origin</c> 參數的位元組位移

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see cref="T:System.IO.SeekOrigin" /> indicating the reference point used to obtain the new position
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.SeekOrigin" /> 型別的值，表示用來取得新位置的參考點。

trans-unit.source: Sets the position within the current stream.
trans-unit.target: 設定目前資料流位置。

trans-unit.source: The new position within the current stream.
trans-unit.target: 目前資料流的新位置。

trans-unit.source: The desired length of the current stream in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 想要的目前資料流長度 (單位為位元組)。

trans-unit.source: Sets the length of the current stream.
trans-unit.target: 設定目前資料流的長度。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlFileStream.CanRead%2A> property to determine whether the current instance supports reading.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlFileStream.CanRead%2A>屬性來判斷目前的執行個體是否支援讀取。

trans-unit.source: The object does not support reading of data.
trans-unit.target: 此物件不支援讀取資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the transaction context for this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlFileStream" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlFileStream" /> 物件的交易內容。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="transactionContext" /> array that was passed to the constructor for this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlFileStream" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="transactionContext" /> 陣列，已傳遞至這個 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlFileStream" /> 物件的建構函式。

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: This method copies <c>count</c> bytes from <c>buffer</c> to the current stream.
trans-unit.target: 此方法會從 <c>buffer</c> 複製 <c>count</c> 個位元組到目前的資料流。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based byte offset in <c>buffer</c> at which to begin copying bytes to the current stream.
trans-unit.target: <c>buffer</c> 中以零為起始的位元組位移，將會從該處開始將位元組複製到目前的資料流。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to be written to the current stream.
trans-unit.target: 寫入目前資料流的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: Writes a sequence of bytes to the current stream and advances the current position within this stream by the number of bytes written.
trans-unit.target: 將位元組序列寫入至目前的資料流，並依寫入的位元組數將資料流中目前的位置往前移。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlFileStream.CanWrite%2A> property to determine whether the current instance supports writing.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlFileStream.CanWrite%2A>屬性來判斷目前的執行個體是否支援寫入。

trans-unit.source: The object does not support writing of data.
trans-unit.target: 此物件不支援寫入資料。

trans-unit.source: The byte to write to the stream.
trans-unit.target: 寫入資料流的位元組。

trans-unit.source: Writes a byte to the current position in the stream and advances the position within the stream by one byte.
trans-unit.target: 寫入一個位元組至資料流的目前位置，並將資料流位置推進一個位元組。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlFileStream.CanWrite%2A> property to determine whether the current instance supports writing.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlFileStream.CanWrite%2A>屬性來判斷目前的執行個體是否支援寫入。

trans-unit.source: The object does not support writing of data.
trans-unit.target: 此物件不支援寫入資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value, in milliseconds, that determines how long the stream will attempt to write before timing out.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定毫秒值，該值決定在逾時前資料流將嘗試寫入多長時間。

trans-unit.source: A value, in milliseconds, that determines how long the stream will attempt to write before timing out.
trans-unit.target: 毫秒值，該值決定在逾時前資料流將嘗試寫入多長時間。
